Sentencas: Segmentation of images from scanning electron microscope, especially multiphase, poses a drawback in their microstructure quantification process.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The labeling process must be automatized due to the time consumption and irreproducibility of the manual labeling procedure.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Here we show a swarm intelligence-driven filtration methodology performed on raw solid oxide fuel cell anode's material images to improve the segmentation methods' performance.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The methodology focused on two significant parts of the segmentation process, which are filtering and labeling.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: During the first one, the images underwent filtering by applying a series of filters, whose operation parameters were determined using Particle Swarm Optimization upon a dedicated cost function.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Next, Seeded Region Growing, k-Means Clustering, Multithresholding, and Simple Linear Iterative Clustering Superpixel algorithms were utilized to label the filtered images' regions into consecutive phases in the microstructure.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The improvement was presented for three different metrics: the Misclassification Ratio, Structural Similarity Index Measure, and Mean Squared Error.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The obtained distribution of metrics' performances was based on 200 images, with and without filtering.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: Results indicate an improvement up to 29%, depending on the metric and method used.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode

Sentencas: The presented work contributes to the ongoing efforts to automatize segmentation processes fully for an increasing number of tomographic measurements, particularly in solid oxide fuel cell research.
Titulo: Swarm Intelligence-Based Methodology for Scanning Electron Microscope Image Segmentation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode
